title: Water quality indicators influencing the formation and morphology of hydrostatically-formed photogranules
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00054D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Cynthia J. Castro, W. Camilla Kuo-Dahab, Tao Jiang, Sam Downes, Guoping Zhang, Ahmed S. Abouhend, Caitlyn S. Butler
Initial water quality parameters in hydrostatic photogranulation determine photogranule shape (spherical or disk-shaped), impacting their physical traits and wastewater treatment effectiveness.
